title: Does anyone else have this problem?
body: I've had this one bug happen to me once or twice now, but my friend is having this same problem right now. It's when you are in the loading screen right before the game begins, and it keeps telling you to reconnect because your network is not working or something like that. And it keeps repeating over and over again. Now my friend has a 20 min wait time for a game! This is absolutely annoying! If you have this same problem or know if someone has this problem please report it before anyone gets their account banned! The struggle is honestly real...

replies.body: You shouldn't be getting any bans, but if you keep entering into games knowing your connection has been a little spotty you do run the risk of getting more and more LPQs. I'd consider taking a step back from playing games until you troubleshoot your network using this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
